intro.headline: Turning curiosity into creativity — one session at a time. Small workshops, big creations…
intro.subheadline: Our workshops are fun-sized, hands-on sessions designed to spark curiosity and help kids discover new interests, build confidence, and learn beyond the classroom — all while having a great time!
intro.details: Our workshops have a small group size for personal attention, engaging activities, certificates of participation for every child, and a safe, online space to learn, laugh, and grow.

workshops.title: Creative Writing Workshops
workshops.content: Learn to turn ideas into stories, poems, or essays. Explore characters, imagination, and the joy of storytelling!

workshops.title: Math Adventures
workshops.content: Crack puzzles, solve fun challenges, and discover how math can be magical and exciting.

workshops.title: Mini Science Experiments
workshops.content: Watch, learn, and try cool hands-on experiments with easy explanations you can understand and repeat at home.

workshops.title: Little Chefs’ Corner
workshops.content: Fun cooking activities where kids learn simple recipes, kitchen safety, and the joy of creating something delicious!

workshops.title: Monthly Reading Recommendations
workshops.content: Kids can read hand-picked books and get ready for a workshop with their reviews, favorite character from the book, and why they loved the book or why not.

workshops.title: Craft & DIY Creations
workshops.content: Make amazing crafts, decorations, and art projects using everyday materials — because creativity can start anywhere!

workshops.title: Speak Up! (Public Speaking & Debating)
workshops.content: Build confidence, learn to express your ideas, and become a voice that shines — from storytelling to debates!

howItWorks.title: Small Groups
howItWorks.content: We host small, interactive workshops on Google Meet, with about 10–12 kids per group for a friendly and focused experience.

howItWorks.title: Expert Mentors
howItWorks.content: Each session is led by an enthusiastic mentor who guides children step by step.

howItWorks.title: Parent Updates
howItWorks.content: Parents receive details in advance — including workshop time, materials needed, and the Meet link.
